蔓性植物: (つるせいしょくぶつ) - creeper (plant that grows along the ground, etc. similar to a vine)
蔓植物: (つるしょくぶつ) - creeper (creeping plant); trailer (trailing plant); climber (climbing plant); vine
蔓生: (まんせい) - creeping (i.e. growing along the ground, etc. similar to a vine)
蔓紫: (ツルムラサキ) - Malabar spinach (Basella alba); Indian spinach
蔓苔桃: (ツルコケモモ) - small cranberry (Vaccinium oxycoccos)
蔓茘枝: (ツルレイシ) - bitter melon (Momordica charantia); bitter gourd
蔓荊: (ハマゴウ) - beach vitex (Vitex rotundifolia); round-leaf vitex
蔓衍: (まんえん) - spread (e.g. of a disease); rampancy; infestation; proliferation; being widespread
蔓返し: (つるがえし) - digging up, removing sprouts from, and replanting tubers (esp. of the sweet potato) to make for a bigger end product
蔓金梅: (ツルキンバイ) - Potentilla yokusaiana (species of cinquefoil)
蔗糖: (しょとう) - sucrose; saccharose; cane sugar
蔦: (ちょう) - Vine , ivy (especialmente hera-de-boston, Parthenocissus tricuspidata)
蔦漆: (ツタウルシ) - Asian poison ivy (Rhus ambigua)
蔦葛: (つたかずら) - ivy and vines; creepers
蔦蔓: (つたかずら) - ivy and vines; creepers
蔦蘿: (つたかずら) - ivy and vines; creepers
蔭口: (かげぐち) - malicious gossip; backbiting; speaking ill behind someone's back
蔭間: (かげま) - homosexual prostitute who sold favors at banquets, etc. (late Edo); actor-in-training in kabuki
蔵: (zou/kura) - warehouse , warehouse, storehouse, cellar, magazine, granary, godown, depository, treasury, elevator
蔵う: (しまう) - to finish/to stop/to end/to put an end to/to bring to a close; to close (a business, etc.)/to close down/to shut down/to shut up; to put away/to put back/to keep/to store; (after the -te form of a verb, indicates completion (and sometimes reluctance, regret, etc.)) to finish .../to do ... completely
蔵する: (ぞうする) - to store; to contain
蔵づくり: (くらづくり) - warehouse style/house built like a kura, with the walls covered in mud; building a kura storehouse/someone who builds kura storehouses
蔵人: (くらびと) - keeper of imperial archives; worker skilled in the brewing of sake or soy sauce
蔵元: (くらもと) - brewery (sake, soy)/brewer; warehouse overseer
蔵入れ: (くらいれ) - warehousing; storing in a warehouse
蔵出し: (くらだし) - releasing stored goods (esp. sake); delivery (of goods from a storehouse)
蔵匿: (ぞうとく) - concealment; shelter; harboring; harbouring
蔵書印: (ぞうしょいん) - ownership mark or stamp; bookplate
蔵書票: (ぞうしょひょう) - bookplate; ex libris
蔵造り: (くらづくり) - warehouse style/house built like a kura, with the walls covered in mud; building a kura storehouse/someone who builds kura storehouses
蔵開き: (くらびらき) - first opening of warehouse after New Year
蔵面: (ぞうめん) - rectangular bugaku mask made of thick paper and white silk with facial features drawn on it
蔵骨器: (ぞうこつき) - funerary urn; cinerary urn
蔽う: (おおう) - to cover; to hide; to conceal; to wrap; to disguise
蕁麻疹: (ジンマシン) - hives; nettle rash; urticaria
蕃僧: (ばんそう) - foreign priest; Western priest
蕃別: (ばんべつ) - clans supposedly descended from foreign lineage (i.e. Chinese or Korean)
蕃椒: (トウガラシ) - capsicum (Capsicum annuum, esp. the cultivated chili peppers)/chili pepper (chile, chilli)/cayenne/red pepper; shichimi pepper
蕃殖: (はんしょく) - breed; multiply; increase; propagation
蕉風: (しょうふう) - correct style in a haiku (like Basho's)
蕎麦がき: (そばがき) - buckwheat dumpling; buckwheat mash; buckwheat dough ball
蕎麦切: (そばきり) - soba; Japanese buckwheat noodles
蕎麦切り: (そばきり) - soba; Japanese buckwheat noodles
蕎麦掻: (そばがき) - buckwheat dumpling; buckwheat mash; buckwheat dough ball
蕎麦掻き: (そばがき) - buckwheat dumpling; buckwheat mash; buckwheat dough ball
蕎麦湯: (そばゆ) - soba water; water left in the pot after one has boiled soba
蕎麦滓: (ソバカス) - freckles; (蕎麦滓 only) (orig. meaning)  buckwheat chaff
蕎麦飯: (そばめし) - soba and rice cooked together along with meat, vegetables, etc. on a metal plate
蕓薹: (ウンタイ) - rape (seed oil plant, Brassica campestris); Chinese colza; yuntai
蕗: (ろ) - Butterbur , giant butterbur (Petasites japonicus), Japanese sweet coltsfoot
蕗の薹: (ふきのとう) - edible flower bud of the fuki (Petasites japonicus) plant, an early spring delicacy
蕤賓: (すいひん) - (in China) 7th note of the ancient chromatic scale (approx. G sharp); fifth lunar month
